title: End of Season Rewards
body:
Hey Summoners! I am new to the forums so I apologize if this is in the wrong forum, however, I have a question regarding the rewards for end season 3. If I were to place gold on a 3's team would I receive the rewards when season 4 starts?

Thanks!

replies.body: As long as you meet the team participation requirements (something like 10 wins on the team or something) you are viable for the gold rewards. The queue type doesn't matter.

I just wanted to build on your comment here.  I can confirm that in order to earn rewards on a Ranked Team (either 3v3, or 5v5), you need to win 10 games on that team to earn rewards based on the highest achieved Tier/division of the Ranked Team.  

For all other information regarding Season 3 rewards, make sure to check out the End of Season 3 Rewards FAQ found here:

http://beta.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/check-out-season-3-rewards-faq

I hope this helps!
I was going to link that but I'm at work and had to take care of a customer :P

Additional Clarification.  10 wins, no exceptions?  So the 5 placement games will not be sufficient, ever?

Edit: I, of course, mean for teams.
aw, right on okay thanks! I have had no luck solo que.. It's all AFK'ers and laggers.. I'm so sick of this game. I m going to try my odds making a 3's team.
